title: How to secretly follow someone's playlist on Spotify - Quora

response.answer_text: you don’t have to worry about them knowing, spotify has it so that there’s no way of knowing who is following your playlists. all they will be able to see is the number of likes they get but they will not know that it is you so just follow it and they won’t know. they will however know if you follow their profile but you can follow any playlists anonymously.
